termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due prior to the event date unless otherwise agreed in writing.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the event may incur a fee.

discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services, facilities, and offerings.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and booking process.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your preferred dates, choose an available room, and fill out the booking form. You'll receive payment instructions to confirm your booking.
faqQ2Title: How do I book a hall or section for an event?
faqQ2Answer: Go to the 'Halls & Sections' page. Select the desired date range and filter by type if needed. Choose the hall(s) or section(s) you need, then click 'Book Selected Items' and complete the booking form. Our team will contact you regarding approval and payment.
faqQ3Answer: Currently, we accept payments via direct bank transfer to the account details provided during the booking process or on the payment details page. After payment, you'll need to send proof via our Telegram bot.
faqQ4Title: How can I check the status of my dormitory booking?
faqQ4Answer: Visit the 'My Dormitory' page from the navigation menu and enter the phone number you used during booking to see the status of your active, approved bookings.
faqQ5Title: What if I need to cancel or modify my booking?
faqQ5Answer: For cancellations or modifications, please contact our administration directly through the phone numbers or email provided on the 'Contact Us' page as soon as possible.
faqQ6Title: Are there any specific rules for using the facilities?
faqQ6Answer: Yes, all guests and event organizers are expected to adhere to the center's code of conduct and terms of service. For facility rentals, specific terms will be outlined in the rental agreement.
faqQ7Title: Who can book halls and sections?
faqQ7Answer: Halls and sections are primarily for company or organizational bookings. Company representatives need to register their company first. Once approved, they can log in and make bookings.
brochureSubtitle: Your ideal partner for comfortable accommodation and successful events at {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is dedicated to providing top-notch dormitory and facility rental services. We aim to offer a seamless and comfortable experience for all our guests and clients, supported by modern amenities and a dedicated team.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Well-maintained and secure dormitory rooms for individuals and groups, suitable for short and long-term stays.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious halls and flexible sections perfect for conferences, workshops, meetings, and various events, equipped with necessary facilities.
brochureCateringDesc: Customizable catering options, including lunch and refreshment packages, to complement your events and meetings.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and much more designed for your convenience and safety.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and guest satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are here to assist you. Contact us for inquiries or proceed to book your stay or event space through our online portal.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries related to dormitory rooms within these buildings, please contact the respective administrator.
adminIfaBoruName: Mr. Ifa Boru (Ifa Boru Building Admin)

pricingHierarchyInfoDesc: The prices set here are global defaults. Individual items (dormitories, halls, sections) can have their own specific prices set on their respective management pages, which will override these defaults if specified.
